description:
I always know when I have a good film when we have a hard time keeping the bed in place! Dayton fucked Spence so vigorously that not only was the mattress moving all over the place, the bed was too!
Dayton loves positions where he can go deep, and he loves to do a lot of positions. I loved watching him move Spence around and putting him just where he wanted him...
title: Spence & Dayton
